Pardon my Ignorance , but is the Silsko Edition 2 Alpha weighted on the same scale as the vanilla parts? Is it a modification to the game like the first edition or is it in effect a parts pack like the Probe kit and BASE?

Pardon my Ignorance , but is the Silsko Edition 2 Alpha weighted on the same scale as the vanilla parts? Is it a modification to the game like the first edition or is it in effect a parts pack like the Probe kit and BASE?

I\'ve explained this a few times, but, it\'s a new balance scale, without replacing the old parts. It\'s stand-alone like Probodobodyne and BACE.
Do I need to install Silisko 2 into it\'s own KSP or can I mix it with the vanilla parts?

Do I need to install Silisko 2 into it\'s own KSP or can I mix it with the vanilla parts?

Stand-alone. Ergo, yes, you can mix it with vanilla parts.
Right, it\'ll work with vanilla parts, but what about the stock parts?
(incoming \'not sure if serious\' image)

Right, it\'ll work with vanilla parts, but what about the stock parts?

Just not the chocolate parts. Vanilla are fine.
Just not the chocolate parts. Vanilla are fine.

(incoming \'not sure if serious\' image)

I just felt a '/s' would have ruined it...

I\'ve explained this a few times, but, it\'s a new balance scale, without replacing the old parts. It\'s stand-alone like Probodobodyne and BACE.

Thank you.

First off, I would like to congratulate you Nova for the latest iteration of the greatest mod collection in Kerbal history.

Secondly, I would like to ask if you could create a few more probe-y things for Probodobodyne. I was thinking along the lines of Mars probes. Scoops, elevated cameras/eyes, small rover (I believe you have that planned), and perhaps a little pod that opens to release the probe:

The Mars Spirit rover had an airbag that that came down, and once landed would open up to reveal the probe. I\'m not asking for the airbag (though that would be quite interesting), but the opening piece.

Please take your time though on the projects you already have, I don\'t want my request to slow down any project you\'re working on.
I\'d like to see this happen, especially if it works in a vacuum.

First off, I would like to congratulate you Nova for the latest iteration of the greatest mod collection in Kerbal history.

Secondly, I would like to ask if you could create a few more probe-y things for Probodobodyne. I was thinking along the lines of Mars probes. Scoops, elevated cameras/eyes, small rover (I believe you have that planned), and perhaps a little pod that opens to release the probe:

The Mars Spirit rover had an airbag that that came down, and once landed would open up to reveal the probe. I\'m not asking for the airbag (though that would be quite interesting), but the opening piece.

Please take your time though on the projects you already have, I don\'t want my request to slow down any project you\'re working on.

I like the idea of the camera mast. I\'ll work on that after I get this rover working.

My current orbital vehicle.

I can\'t wait for the next SE alpha.
